title: kausalyA nandana
sahitya:
kausalyA nandanA mA kamalAnana rAmA


anupallavi

  vAsavAdi vinutA vasiSTa hrnmandArA 
dAsa lakSmaNa bharat shatrughna sOdara


caraNam    mahariSi kaushika makhamu rakSinci sahajamugAhalyA 
shApamu dIrci mahAdEvuni shApamu mahA sabhalO 
viricitamahi tanaya ceibaTTina mA harikEsha IshA
